name: Puppy Pets Puzzle Program
description:
Developers: Basil, Zuriel Zavala, Turner Pahl

P4 is a immersive puzzle style connect three game where you are an employee at a small pet store called the Puppy Play Place (or the PPP as they call it). You begin your shift and are shown how to work at the PPP. Through your shifts you meet the pets ; Banan, Pura, Baud and Shab. Throughout the story you get introduced to each animal and once you complete your shift, you get to know more about the pets backstory, and their happy ending.
